comment.author: 92709190@N00
comment._content: This is great. Will you be posting some of his field photography too? You have amazing photos in your archives of his Trobriand Island fieldwork.

comment.author: 35128489@N07
comment._content: Hi Urbanmkr Thanks for your comment. We do not currently have plans to put Malinowski's field photography on Flickr, however we do have 1000 of his images already available online through our catalogue at www2.lse.ac.uk/library/archive/holdings/malinowski_bronis...
